main.title: Welcome to TransAndalus
main.subtitle: A 2000 Km MTB route through Andalusia

step1.title: Plan your route
step1.body: Choose destination considering your physical preparation, your agenda and your likes: ravines or valleys, beach or mountain, cities or villages, there are plenty for everyone!

step2.title: Download the track
step2.body: View your selected stages in 'My adventure' personal section and download the tracks for free. You can also save your favourites stages for the next time.

step3.title: Go cicling!
step3.body: Browse your route from your smartphone or gps and enjoy the Andalusian gastronomy, people and landscapes! Don't forget to download an off-line map of the zone.
